name: eSword
author: eNJuR
info: Allows an enemy to wield a sword.
description: Now, you can make an enemy that actually holds a weapon instead of trying to randomly run into you! What it does: creates an enemy on the screen and makes it wield a sword! The enemy will always re-appear whenever you re-enter the screen unless another script sets Screen->D[0] to something besides 0.
setup: D0: ID of the enemy.D1: Starting X position.D2: Starting Y position.D3: How many pixels ahead of the enemy the sword is. (11-14 are good numbers)D4: ID of the sprite to use.D5: Damage the weapon does in quarter hearts.D6: How many frames the enemy waits before re-stabbing the sword if it hit something.
